content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of stone, and my inventory now contains wood, stone, and iron ore.
# 
# Now that I have the necessary materials, I can craft a stone furnace.

# First, I will check if I have enough wood to craft the stone furnace.
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Wood, 0) >= 5, "Not enough wood to craft a stone furnace"

# Now I will craft the stone furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Crafting the stone furnace

# Checking inventory after crafting
print(f"Inventory after crafting the stone furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
